[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.2 Scope: Space Fractions provides an intuitive web-based environment for real-time gameplay, feedback, and administrative updates, ensuring adaptive learning experiences.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.1 Purpose: The Space Fractions game defines requirements for an interactive educational platform that enhances fraction-solving skills for sixth-grade students through engaging, storyline-based gameplay.

[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.2 User Interfaces: Space Fractions features a user-friendly interface with animations, tutorials, and guided problem-solving.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.3 Hardware Interfaces: Space Fractions operates on standard Internet-enabled devices, including desktops, tablets, and laptops.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.4 Software Interfaces: Space Fractions requires a Flash-compatible browser and does not rely on additional software.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.5 Communications Interfa: Space Fractions enables real-time data exchange using secure web-based protocols.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.6 Memory Constraints: Space Fractions is optimized for minimal memory overhead, allowing efficient gameplay and question updates.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.7 Operations: Space Fractions ensures 24/7 availability, supporting multiple simultaneous users.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.8 Site Adaptation Requir: Space Fractions is adaptable to diverse educational environments and learning needs.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.9 Interfaces with Servic: Space Fractions integrates with administrative tools for updating questions and tracking progress.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.1 MISSING-TAG2: Space Fractions integrates with web browsers supporting Flash-based content for seamless gameplay.

[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.5 User Characteristics: Designed for students with basic digital literacy and educators seeking engaging teaching tools.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.6 Limitations: Space Fractions relies on Flash-compatible browsers and stable Internet connectivity.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.7 Assumptions and Dependencie: Space Fractions requires web accessibility compliance, browser compatibility, and secure hosting.
[SUBSEC] 1.8 Definitions: Fraction: Numerical value representing part of a whole.
Storyline: Sequence of interactive educational events guiding gameplay.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.4 MISSING-TAG1: Space Fractions facilitates fraction-solving exercises, real-time scoring, and storyline-based challenges for enhanced learning.

[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-001: The system shall deliver storyline-based fraction-solving sessions with user feedback (REQ-DB-001).
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-002: The system shall allow administrators to update game questions dynamically (REQ-DB-001).

[SUBSEC] 2.3 Usability Requirements.REQ-USAB-001: The interface shall provide intuitive navigation and contextual hints (REQ-DB-001).

[SUBSEC] 2.4 Performance Requirements.REQ-PERF-001: The system shall maintain a response time of less than 100 milliseconds per user interaction, even with up to 500 concurrent users (REQ-DB-001).

[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-001: The system shall store user scores locally during gameplay to ensure fast access.
[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-002: The database shall support efficient backup and restoration (REQ-DB-001).

[SUBSEC] 2.8 Software System Attributes.REQ-ATTR-001: The system shall log errors for debugging purposes (REQ-DB-001).

[SUBSEC] 2.6 Design Constraints.REQ-DSGN-001: The system shall comply with accessibility standards for educational tools (REQ-DB-001).

[SUBSEC] 2.7 Standards Compliance.REQ-COMP-001: The system shall adhere to GDPR standards for secure data handling (REQ-DB-001).

[SUBSEC] 2.1 MISSING-TAG3.REQ-INTF-001: The system shall integrate with web browsers supporting Flash movies (REQ-DB-001).
[SUBSEC] 2.1 MISSING-TAG3.REQ-INTF-002: The system shall provide administrators with tools for real-time question updates (REQ-DB-001).

[SEC] 3. Verification: Functional testing, performance benchmarking, and compliance validation will ensure the system meets all requirements.
[SEC] 4. Supporting Information: User manuals and guides for administrators.
[SEC] 5. References: Educational software guidelines and browser support documentation.
